title: MP Louise Ellman quits Labour after 55 years, because Corbyn is 'not fit to serve as our Prime Minister'
text:
Dame Louise Ellman has quit the Labour party after 55 years as she said Jeremy Corbyn is “not fit to serve as our Prime Minister”.

The veteran Labour MP said that under Mr Corbyn’s leadership “antisemitism has become mainstream in the Labour party, Jewish members have been bullied, abused and driven out.”

Ms Ellman has served as the MP for Liverpool Riverside since 1997.

She wrote tonight: "I have this evening resigned from the Labour Party. I have been a member for 55 years and a public representative in local and central government continuously since 1970. My decision has been truly agonising, as it has been for the thousands of other party members who have already left.”

She ruled out joining...
description: Dame Louise Ellman has quit the Labour party after 55 years as she said Jeremy Corbyn is “not fit to serve as our Prime Minister”.
